attributes.action: pressure Richard Angus to admit that he bats for the other side
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Although he has an admirable track record with the ladies, for years it has been an open secret that Gus harbours homosexual feelings. With the help of our government, perhaps we can persuade him that there is no shame in coming out of the closet.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
